name: Hiryuu no Ken III: 5 Nin no Ryuu Senshi
overview: Hiryuu no Ken III is the third game in the martial arts action RPG series. Ryuuhi, Hayato, Wyler, Shouryuu, and Minmin are known as five dragon warriors, continuing the fight against the evil shadowy organization. In this side-scrolling action game your deadliest weapon is your fighting skill as you will have to bash and punch through hordes of enemy combatants and bosses alike. Game also offers selection among three difficulty settings.
